promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic fox grass-type pokemon wearing white bracers. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Foliwrist, a a young basic fox grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Attack Order. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "grass" or "Foliwrist". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, fox-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Verdant hide blending with the forest, this creature instructs woodland critters in defense. Common in leafy habitats; a natural strategist.
